metadata.title: CVE-2016-3910 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: services/soundtrigger/SoundTriggerHwService.cpp in mediaserver in Android5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before 5.1.1, 6.x before 2016-10-01, and 7.0before 2016-10-01 allows attackers to gain privileges via a craftedapplication, aka internal bug 30148546.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
